name: Heroes of Magic: Card Battle RPG PRO
name_original: Heroes of Magic: Card Battle RPG PRO
description:
Play our tactical turn-based CCG with tons of collectible cards and use of strategy to crush your enemies on this fantasy world at war between 3 different factions.

Join a quick turn-based tactical cards game and summon mighty heroes on the battlefield with unique magic to crush your rival on an online collectible card game where deck building is the key to win the war. Command your Heroes and use of strategy !

Before create your deck, select from a choice of 3 mighty commanders who each have their own and legendary heroes/magic.
-Beast Warlord, Majesty of the forest, he controls beast and tree.
-Royale Knight, Might and Mighty, he commands the most Heroic Knight
-Rogue Goddess, Evil herself, she leads the most chaos beast.

More than 60 heroes are available for you to create a variety of tactical play and find your own deck with a collection of heroes, beast, tower, skill and building, build wisely your collections of cards before join the arena.

On a turn-based real-time pvp battle, challenge your friends or play against rival players and crush them with your deck of collectible heroes.

Use of strategy to crush your rivals on an legendary battle under 3 minutes and rise your league.

Start the campaign mode to discover the world of Heroes Of Magic and unlock new collectible cards.

FEATURES
✔ Turn-Based Real-Time Battle PVP
✔ Unlimited Collectible Cards on a TCG gameplay
✔ Under 3 Minutes Battle
✔ +60 Collection of Heroes Available
✔ 3 Mighty Commander
✔ Unique Cards/Magic
✔ Heroes, Beast, Tower, Building and Magic in battle !
✔ Unique Legendary Cards Loyal To Their Commander
✔ Tactical Gameplay on a CCG
✔ Free to play
